text: Georges Bizet (25 October 1838 â€“ 3 June 1875) was a French composer of the Romantic period. He is best known for his opera Carmen, which is the best- known of all French operas. Bizet was born in Paris and died in Bougival. After he died, most of his work was not popular. Many of the manuscripts he made were lost. After many years, his work started to be performed more. == References == Category:1838 births Category:1875 deaths Category:19th-century French composers Category:Musicians from Paris Category:People with foods named after them Category:Romantic composers
title: Georges Bizet
